scripts.version: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && sed -i "s/__VERSION__/${PACKAGE_VERSION}/g" dist/hmap.user.js
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run browserify && npm run copy-headers && npm run version
